column2: A tribal ruler's authority is only as strong as how much other chiefs respect your prestige and fear your power. With your low prestige and failure to exert your authority over any significant amount of land, your claim to be king over all of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has been increasingly ignored and is now essentially meaningless.
We are gaining respect among our fellow chieftains and tribesmen. Our levy size and vassal opinion have §Gincreased§!.
We are losing respect among our fellow chieftains and tribesmen. Our levy size and vassal opinion have §Rdecreased§!.

[Root.TopLiege.GetTitledName] has decreed that the proportion of silver in the imperial coinage is to be reduced to help the treasury pay off its debts. This is likely to cause some economic disruption in the near future.
I am sure the [Root.TopLiege.GetRulerTitle] knows what [Root.TopLiege.GetSheHe] is doing.
